languages.text: If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, the wielder gets a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their AGI, PER, INT, and WIL, while the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the same {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, the wielder gets a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their AGI, PER, INT, and WIL, while the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the same {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text: After the wielder deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, the wielder gets a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their AGI, PER, INT, and WIL, while the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the same {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: After the wielder deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

After the wielder deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

After the wielder deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者がこの剣で対象に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えると、戦闘終了まで使用者は {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}が+3され、対象はこれらの{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対して−3の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: After the wielder deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がこの剣で対象に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えると、戦闘終了まで使用者は {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}が+3され、対象はこれらの{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対して−3の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} этим мечом, персонаж получает бонус +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}, а цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −3 к тем же {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя.
languages.original_text: After the wielder deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} этим мечом, персонаж получает бонус +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}, а цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −3 к тем же {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя.

Нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} этим мечом, персонаж получает бонус +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}, а цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −3 к тем же {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя.

Нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} этим мечом, персонаж получает бонус +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}, а цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −3 к тем же {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя.

languages.text: Fügt der Träger dem Ziel mit diesem Schwert {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}. Das Ziel wird mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −3 auf diese {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} belegt.
languages.original_text: After the wielder deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Fügt der Träger dem Ziel mit diesem Schwert {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}. Das Ziel wird mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −3 auf diese {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} belegt.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi; bu kılıçla hedefe herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiğinde +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliği{/g} kazanırken hedefse aynı niteliklere −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: After the wielder deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişi; bu kılıçla hedefe herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiğinde +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliği{/g} kazanırken hedefse aynı niteliklere −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

languages.text: Quand l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à sa cible avec cette épée, il obtient un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de +3, tandis qu'une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −3 s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} correspondantes de la cible jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: After the wielder deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Quand l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à sa cible avec cette épée, il obtient un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de +3, tandis qu'une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −3 s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} correspondantes de la cible jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: Después de que el usuario inflija cualquier cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al objetivo con esta espada, hasta el final del combate gana +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}, mientras que el objetivo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −3 a esas mismas {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}.
languages.original_text: After the wielder deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Después de que el usuario inflija cualquier cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al objetivo con esta espada, hasta el final del combate gana +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}, mientras que el objetivo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −3 a esas mismas {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用这把战刀造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}都会提高3点，而目标相应{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}降低3点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: After the wielder deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用这把战刀造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}都会提高3点，而目标相应{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}降低3点，效果持续至战斗结束。
